TopicTitle: way to hide ships in the tracking station

Articles.Content:
I wanted to suggest a way to hide ships and flags in the tracking station display.

I just finished farming all the science off the mun. I now have 8 flights in the tracking station, I just want a way to not show them in the list.

In the tracking station / map view there are buttons at the top of the screen representing every type of craft. By right clicking them, you can toggle whether they are shown in the tracking station / map view. This will not remove them from the "flights in progress" number attached to your save, and you cannot hide individual ships.

But for simply removing flags from the tracking station list, it works well.

Right clicking the tabs only temporarily hides a catagory. As soon as you come back to the map a second time they're all visible again.

I can think of two ways to remove individual flights from the map:

1: Kill the ship. Remove the flight completely. But doing this there is no turning back.

2: Label the ship as debris. Debris is not displayed by default but can be displayed by clicking the debris tab. When you ever decide you want to use the craft again just label it back to ship, lander, station or whatever.
